page.title: 16Latest Projects.
page.content: {Stansted Railway Bridge.}In 1985 the people of the village witnessed the demonlition of the bridge making way for a new one only centimetres higher as part of the electrification of the railway line from London to Cambridge. {Shopping Precinct.}The centre of Stansted is being developed for local residents to wander freely to subsidise their daily requirements. These new shops include a video rental service,cleaners,hair-dressers, delicatessen and craft shop. {The'Old Bell' public house.}This 16th century inn is now under-going alterations and development for drinking and eating. The new building to the rear is to provide luxury accomodation including a bridal-suite. A transport service to the local air- port is to be available for travellers wishing to go abroad.
